## rushDependencyGraph() function

Generates a dependency tree of every project in a Rush monorepo

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rushDependencyGraph(options?: RushDependencyGraphOptions): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [RushDependencyGraphOptions](./markdown-magic-utils.rushdependencygraphoptions.md) | Optional configuration options |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

ASCII dependency tree in a code block
